Description:
Detect the update check performed by Advanced IP/Port Scanner utilities.

Author: Axel Olsson
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: PUA - Advanced IP/Port Scanner Update Check
Query: c-uri="*/checkupdate.php*" (c-uri-query="*lng=*" c-uri-query="*ver=*" c-uri-query="*beta=*" c-uri-query="*type=*" c-uri-query="*rmode=*" c-uri-query="*product=*")
